content: On a consolidated basis, Modivcare reported strong financial results in the first quarter of 2022, delivering 27% revenue growth, driven by contributions from our recent acquisitions and 17% growth from our NEMT segment, which generated 9% adjusted EBITDA margin this quarter. In order to improve network performance, drive down costs and enhance our members’ experience, our initial focus has been on initiatives such as Modivcare Academy, which empowers community-based providers, specifically minority- and women-owned businesses, with education training resources, and our transportation provider advisory council, which is composed of TPs representative of the communities we serve and addresses feedback on issues impacting the broader network.
